name: Romeo & Juliet
Start point: Juliet on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of her house west of Varrock, south of the bank.
Description: Romeo and Juliet are in love, but Juliet's father disapproves. Help Romeo by finding a way for them to be together, despite the obstacles.

Items required: Cadaver berries (can be obtained during the quest)

substeps: Speak to Juliet on the balcony (1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US]) of her house, located west of Varrock square and south of the west bank. She asks you to deliver a message to Romeo.
Find Romeo wandering around Varrock square.
Speak to Romeo. He reads the message and asks you to seek help from Father Lawrence.
Go to the church in north-east Varrock.
Speak to Father Lawrence inside the church. He suggests using a Cadava potion to make Juliet appear dead and directs you to the Apothecary.
Ensure you have Cadava berries. If not, pick some from the bush located just east of the stone circle south-east of Varrock (near the entrance to the mine south of the city).
Go to the Apothecary's building in south-west Varrock (look for the potion icon).
Speak to the Apothecary. Give him the Cadava berries, and he will give you a Cadava potion.
Go upstairs and speak to Juliet again.
Give her the Cadava potion. She will ask you to inform Romeo that everything is ready.
Go back to Romeo in Varrock square.
Speak to Romeo to inform him Juliet has the potion. A cutscene will play.
